verses.verse: And <WG2532> when <WG3753> they draw nigh <WG1448> unto <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419>, unto <WG1519> Bethphage <WG967> and <WG2532> Bethany <WG963>, at <WG4314> the mount <WG3735> of Olives <WG1636>, he sendeth <WG649> two <WG1417> of his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>,

Therefore <WG1223> I <WG5124> say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, All things whatsoever3745, Leviticus2 ye pray <WG154> and ask <WG4336> for <WG4100>, believe that <WG3754> ye receive <WG2983> them <WG2532>, and ye <WG5213> shall have them <WG2071>.

And <WG2532> they come <WG2064> again <WG3825> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414>: and <WG2532> as he <WG846> was walking <WG4043> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>, there come <WG2064> to <WG4314> him <WG846> the chief priests <WG749>, and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122>, and <WG2532> the elders <WG4245>;
